pages.text: The geodes found within the caves contain great catalysts for magical power.
Found in seagrass, lotus seeds can be planted on water. When grown, you can harvest a lotus flower.
The lotus flower has many restorative properties and can be eaten.
Found in grass, snowbell seeds can be planted on dirt. When grown, you can harvest a snowball and some icy needles.
The icy needle, while simple in appearance, is a useful source of ice magic and may help snap you out of your visions.
